alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 8:07PM CDT until April 11 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting Wayne, George and Greene Counties. For the Chickasawhay River...including Waynesboro, Leakesville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay At Leakesville. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flooding of lowlands will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 19.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday morning rising to a crest of 21.0 feet by Saturday evening. The river is then forecast to fall below flood stage by Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
